text: Ki iha loka akhade hana ki isa rasula ne isa nu apane valom ghari'a hai. Akho, ki jekara maim isa nu apane valom bana'i'a hai tam tusim loka mainu bhora vi alaha tom baca nahim sakade. Jihari'am galam tusim gharade ho alaha unham nu cagi taram janada hai. Uha mere ate tuhade vica gavahi la'i kafi hai. Ate uha mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata hai
